ZDO_UserDescSetReq_t Struct Reference

This is generated from a local device wishing to configure the user descriptor on a remote device. This command shall be unicast either to the remote device itself or to an alternative device that contains the discovery information of the remote device. More...

#include <zdo.h>


Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address for the user descriptor setting request.
UserDescriptor_t userDescriptor
 The user descriptor of a device.

Detailed Description

This is generated from a local device wishing to configure the user descriptor on a remote device. This command shall be unicast either to the remote device itself or to an alternative device that contains the discovery information of the remote device.

Definition at line 501 of file zdo.h.
